text: Daniel Köllerer was the defender of championship title, however lost to Federico del Bonis in the quarterfinals. del Bonis won in the final 6–4, 6–3, against Florian Mayer. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== *Qualifying Singles *Main Draw Roma Open - Singles 2010 Singles
title: 2010 Roma Open – Singles
